item.description:
Another day the snow flies
Another day of gloomy skies
Snow has fallen through the night
Morning brings a vastness of white
Snow is falling, those awful flakes
What a long winter this snow makes
Do not fret though help is here
Wii is coming-it’s in the air

Come on over, grab some games
Kick some butt, take some names
Come twirl and wave your arms around
Jump up and down and look like a clown

Many games and favorite Wii Sports
Will have you laughing ‘til it hurts
So if this long winter has you bawling
RSVP now- no more stalling
Come for a night of make-believe
You really need a winter reprieve

 

That night we will reveal a new surprise
You really won’t believe your eyes!
Come…let’s create our own winter fantasy
Screw this weather…it’s sno-Wiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiii!!!!!!!!!!

 

DETAILS

Time: 5 pm to whenever

Please specify your potluck dish

BYOB- we will have soda and water

Parking- parking can be an issue....please do not park on the same side of street in front of the house due to bad curve and crazy drivers.  We may shuttle to the store parking lot up the street if there is a lot of snow...carpooling would be helpful.....we'll work it out as we always do!
item.how_to_find_us: GPS or Mapquest- We are on the corner of Rt 3A at the yellow blinking light
item.why: Winter sucks and we all miss each other!

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Wii... Wii.... Wii.... All the Way Home - Pot Luck and Games
